items.defaultValue: This watch face was developed by Rebble discord members swansswansswansswanssosoft and CasualGamerCC. Join the movement today! http://discord.gg/aRUAYFN

items.label: Alpha Vantage API Key
items.description: You need an API key from Alpha Vantage. You can get one for free here: https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key

items.defaultValue: Enter up to five stock symbols in the fields below. Make sure the symbol is spelled correctly and does contain any extra characters like trailing white spaces.

items.label: Display Mode
items.description: Selecting single stock mode will show just one stock ticker on the Pebble (Stock Symbol #1) with a rich layout. Selecting multi mode will show you all five stock tickers in a minimalist list.

items.label: Price History Horizon
items.description: In single stock mode, the stock's price history will be graphed. This option allows you to specify the price history's datapoint interval. You can view a minutely chart (one day's price history), a daily chart (one year price history), or a weekly chart (five year price history). Price histories are always adjusted for splits.
